comment.author: 84804744@N03
comment._content: This most definitely is NOT the OGLALA/SHAWMUT. But it is indeed a very interesting photo. It is USS AJAX (AC 14), a collier that served as aviation tender to the Asiatic Fleet's Torpedo Squadron Six from February 1924 to May 1925. Read more about her at www.shipscribe.com/usnaux/AC/AC14.html
